Manage your money like a fucking grownup.

A community devoted to bossing your money

Stop being a slave to your paycheque. We’re a community devoted to living the lives we really want to live, by learning how to make money our bitch.

Join the club

Pro-tips, videos and resources in your inbox once a week.
